name: Dice - Craps 3D
description:
With this simple dice game in 3D design, you always have a pair of dice there. Perfect for board games or other dice games like Yahtzee and Backgammon.

You decide the number of dice thrown simultaneously (1, 2, 3 or more dice). The color of the dice and the color of the background are also individually adjustable. If required, in addition, the sum of the dice eyes may appear.

Throw the dice simply by tapping the screen or shaking the device - as easy as playing real dice.
